# Types of Data

---

layout: true
class: title title-2

#Basic Definitions

.box-inv-2.medium[Information is collected on individual items called **elements**.]

--

.box-inv-2.medium[The characteristics of the individuals about which we collect information are called **variables**.]

--

.box-inv-2.medium[The values of the variables that we obtain are called **data**.]

---

# Qualitative and Quantitative Variables

.box-inv-2.medium[**Qualitative variables** aka **Categorical variables** helps us classify elements into categories.]

.box-inv-2.medium[**Quantitative variables** aka **Categorical variables** tell us how much or how many of something there is.]

---

# But wait!

.box-inv-2.medium.sp-after[This isn't so explicit anymore. Applications in machine learning provide researchers the ability to classify text data quantitatively. For now though, let's go with the traditional way of looking at it.]
